data.why:
Develop the concept of an Editable User Interface (EUI), which I
    define on www.sonic.net/~suresh/eui and further illustrate on
    www.sonic.net/~suresh/tms (also on:
    www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1052 ).

    Toward this end, will contribute:

    1) Modules that use a text editor as their user interface, and 2)
    Utilities to enable such modules to work with various text editors.

    --Suresh
